StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateCollegePastProduc.onUsingGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int, @NumMailOutConducted smallint, @PercentMailOutReturn smallint, @NumPosterityConducted smallint, @PercentPosterityReturn smallint, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @CollegePastProduc.onID uniqueiden..er
Select @CollegePastProduc.onID = cp.CollegePro.leID from [USMC].CollegePro.le cp inner join [dbo].High_School hs on cp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE where hs.RowGuid = @SchoolCode and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].CollegePastProduc.on cpe where cpe.CollegePastProduc.onID = @CollegePastProduc.onID and @CollegePastProduc.onID IS NOT NULL) -- then update the exisi.ng record
BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePastProduc.on]
SET [NumMailOutConducted] = @NumMailOutConducted, [PercentMailOutReturn] = @PercentMailOutReturn, [NumPosterityConducted] = @NumPosterityConducted, [PercentPosterityReturn] = @PercentPosterityReturn, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate()
WHERE [CollegePastProduc.onID] = @CollegePastProduc.onID
END
--ELSE PROCEED WITH INSERT ELSE
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePastProduc.on] -- user can insert the CollegePastProduc.onID and .scal year ([CollegePastProduc.onID],[NumMailOutConducted],[PercentMailOutReturn], [NumPosterityConducted],[PercentPosterityReturn],[UserLogin],[UpdateDate]) VALUES (@CollegePastProduc.onID, @NumMailOutConducted,@PercentMailOutReturn, @NumPosterityConducted, @PercentPosterityReturn, @UserLogin,GetDate())
END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
